nodes.text: Rogue One Helmet Creator is a game on StarWars.com that allows the player to design their own starfighter pilot flight helmet. The player can modify the helmet style and color, choose a hero insignia and mohawk stripe, customize the decals on the side, and even add their own face to the helmet. It is no longer available to players.
Calling all rebel pilots: Design your own fighter pilot helmet... and save the Rebellion!
